title: My keyboard stopped working in the middle of the game
body: I used optimized settings for mac and did hextech repair, but I still afk penalties ; _ ; I couldn't use QWER. I could click on them but it be like 2-3 seconds late. Does anyone else have this problem?

replies.body:
Yikes that's definitely not good! Let's be sure to reset those keybindings in hopes this doesn't happen again. Follow these steps, and then double check your hotkey settings in the client options.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
